00026 // lbann_callback_timer .hpp .cpp - Callback hooks to time training
00028 
00029 #include <algorithm>
00030 #include "lbann/utils/lbann_timer.hpp"
00031 #include "lbann/callbacks/lbann_callback_timer.hpp"
00032 
00033 namespace lbann {
00034 
00035 void lbann_callback_timer::on_epoch_begin(model* m) {
00036   epoch_start = get_time();
00037 }
00038 
00039 void lbann_callback_timer::on_epoch_end(model* m) {
00040   double end = get_time();
00041   double epoch_time = end - epoch_start;
00042   // Compute minibatch stats.
00043   double mean = std::accumulate(batch_times.begin(), batch_times.end(), 0.0) /
00044     batch_times.size();
00045   auto minmax = std::minmax_element(batch_times.begin(), batch_times.end());
00046   double stdev = 0.0;
00047   for (const auto& t : batch_times) {
00048     stdev += (t - mean) * (t - mean);
00049   }
00050   stdev = sqrt(stdev / (batch_times.size() - 1));
00051   batch_times.clear();
00052 
00053   // Output.
00054   lbann_comm* comm = m->get_comm();
00055   if (comm->am_model_master()) {
00056     if (comm->am_world_master()) {
00057       std::vector<double> epoch_times(comm->get_num_models());
00058       std::vector<double> means(comm->get_num_models());
00059       std::vector<double> mins(comm->get_num_models());
00060       std::vector<double> maxes(comm->get_num_models());
00061       std::vector<double> stdevs(comm->get_num_models());
00062       comm->intermodel_gather(epoch_time, epoch_times);
00063       comm->intermodel_gather(mean, means);
00064       comm->intermodel_gather(*(minmax.first), mins);
00065       comm->intermodel_gather(*(minmax.second), maxes);
00066       comm->intermodel_gather(stdev, stdevs);
00067       for (int i = 0; i < comm->get_num_models(); ++i) {
00068         std::cout << "Model " << i << " Epoch time: " << epoch_times[i] << "s; ";
00069         std::cout << "Mean minibatch time: " << means[i] << "s; ";
00070         std::cout << "Min: " << mins[i] << "s; ";
00071         std::cout << "Max: " << maxes[i] << "s; ";
00072         std::cout << "Stdev: " << stdevs[i] << "s" << std::endl;
00073       }
00074     } else {
00075       comm->intermodel_gather(epoch_time, comm->get_intermodel_master());
00076       comm->intermodel_gather(mean, comm->get_intermodel_master());
00077       comm->intermodel_gather(*(minmax.first), comm->get_intermodel_master());
00078       comm->intermodel_gather(*(minmax.second), comm->get_intermodel_master());
00079       comm->intermodel_gather(stdev, comm->get_intermodel_master());
00080     }
00081   }
00082 }
00083 
00084 void lbann_callback_timer::on_batch_begin(model* m) {
00085   batch_start = get_time();
00086 }
00087 
00088 void lbann_callback_timer::on_batch_end(model* m) {
00089   double end = get_time();
00090   double mb_time = end - batch_start;
00091   batch_times.push_back(mb_time);
00092   if (summarizer != nullptr) {
00093     summarizer->reduce_scalar("minibatch_time", mb_time, m->get_cur_step());
00094   }
00095 }
00096 
00097 }  // namespace lbann
